structure.unit: STATE LIBRARIES -- LIBRARIANS -- STATE ARCHIVES AND RECORDS

law.history: Repealed 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 61, sec. 12. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 42, sec. 8, effective July 1, 1954. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2451, 2453-1.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Recovery for books not returned and damaged property.
